language.name: ex1
language.description: This is only a template for further languages

language.name: cn1
language.description: The CN01 diphone database consists of 520 diphones, recorded from two native Female singers of Mandarin. The diphones are segmented and organized according to the rule of Pinyin.

language.name: tl1
language.description: Telugu female voice

language.name: es4
language.description: ES4 Spanish male voice from Departamento de Informática, Universidad de Valladolid

language.name: es2
language.description: ES2 2.069 equalized release is a Spanish male diphone database

language.description: nl2

language.description: First Hungarian female voice

language.name: it3
language.description: Italian male voice by Piero Cosi

language.name: gr2
language.description: GR2 is an Hellenic male diphone database. It consists of 1081 diphones. The voice of GR2 MBROLA database belongs to Gerasimos Xydas. This classification was done by Felix, who doesn't know Greek, so many errors happened!

language.name: tr1
language.description: tr1 is a diphone database for Turkish, consisting of 960 diphones, male voice, recorded by Baris Bozkurt. This classification was done by Gokay Abaci.
